channel.title: How do you add godsword emotes with SWAT anime system?
channel.description:
I've got SWAT's system fully working now ... but when I try to add in godsword animes (such as 407) it requires an anim file which is over 3000... and SWAT only gives anime files from 1000-2000.
So how do I get these anime files for the godsword animations?

item.title: How do you add godsword emotes with SWAT anime system?
item.dc:creator: @lord_killord lord killord
